data.Title: LabEase
data.Description: Labease is a comprehensive Lab Management System designed to streamline operations in educational and research labs. It features multi-role support for Admins, Instructors, Lab Assistants, and Students, enabling efficient scheduling, equipment management, reporting, and inventory tracking. With integrated chatbot assistance and real-time notifications, Labease ensures a modern, organized, and user-friendly lab environment.

data.Title: FASTbook Social Media Desktop Application
data.Description: FASTbook is a JavaFX-powered social media desktop application built exclusively for FAST University students. The platform offers an intuitive interface where students can connect, share posts, and engage based on shared academic and social interests. With tailored filters, secure login, and a clean user experience, FASTbook fosters a vibrant digital community within the university.

data.Title: Reactify Mart
data.Description:
Reactify Mart is a dynamic e-commerce web application developed using the MERN stack. It features a sleek frontend built with React and Vanilla CSS, offering smooth navigation, product listings, and shopping cart functionality. Designed for performance and scalability, it aims to replicate real-world shopping experiences with a developer-friendly structure.
Note: Responsive design, Backend, and Payment Integration is in progress.

data.Title: Collaborative Whiteboard
data.Description: The Collaborative Whiteboard is a real-time drawing and communication platform designed for remote teamwork and brainstorming. Built with WebSockets and advanced canvas APIs, it allows users to sketch, write, and collaborate in shared rooms with integrated chat functionality. Perfect for classrooms, meetings, or creative teams, it brings remote collaboration to life in a simple yet powerful way.

data.Title: Employee Performance & Feedback System
data.Description: The Employee Performance & Feedback (EPF) System is a full-stack MERN web application designed to streamline performance management in organizations. It enables admins and HR teams to set employee goals, collect structured feedback, evaluate performance trends, and visualize analytics through an intuitive dashboard. The system improves transparency and efficiency in workforce evaluation by integrating role-based access, secure authentication, and real-time performance tracking.

data.Title: Scrumban Management System
data.Description: The Scrumban Management System is a productivity-focused web application that blends Scrum and Kanban methodologies to support agile teams. It features an integrated Kanban board, to-do lists, and repository-style file storage similar to GitHub, allowing teams to manage tasks, track progress, and store project files efficiently. Designed for seamless collaboration, it enhances workflow visibility and helps teams deliver projects more effectively by supporting sprint planning, backlog refinement, and real-time updates. The system also includes a dynamic sprint burndown chart for better visualization of sprint progress and team velocity.
